sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Glenn Langan, Adele Jergens, Lon Chaney Jr.
Director: Arthur D. Hilton

Before he rose to cult status as The Amazing Colossal Man, Glenn Langan starred as a rookie cop in this thrilling heist film. On the flip side of the law, Jim Davis heads up a crew of ex-cons --  that includes PizzaFLIX all-star Lon Chaney Jr. 

TRIVIA: The Big Chase incorporates footage from Bandit Island, a 26-minute 3-D film produced and directed in 1953 by Robert L. Lippert, Jr.

metadata.Plot: Plot has Korean-War vet Grayson returning and joining the L.A. Police Academy, which we learn in a flashback told by Police Lt. Ned Daggert to story-hunting reporter Milton Graves We also learn that Pete's wife Doris is pregnant and concerned about her husband's safety.Meanwhile, in the state prison, inmates Brad Bellows and Jim Meggs are planning a big heist as soon as Brad gets out of prison. The caper they pull, and the resultant chase, all over Hollywood, Los Angelese and a large portion of Southern California, involving Grayson shows that his wife's concern was more than warranted.
